problem_text_cn: 如图所示，Sub(LengthOfLine(MC)=LengthOfLine(NC))，M平分线段AC，N是线段BC的中点。求直线AC的长度减去直线BC的长度。
problem_text_en: As shown in the diagram, Sub(LengthOfLine(MC)=LengthOfLine(NC)), M is the midpoint of segment AC, N is the midpoint of segment BC. Find the length of line AC minus the length of line BC.
